title: BASL calls on TRCSL to withdraw social media ban
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Bar Association of Sri Lanka (BASL) has called upon the Telecommunication Regulatory Commission of Sri Lanka (TRCSL) to withdraw the ban imposed on social media purportedly on the advice of the Ministry of Defence.
Imposing Social Media Ban a violation of Human Rights – SL Human Rights Chief
